thread.title: Christine Elder

author: Christine Elder
title: Christine Elder
text:
This B&B was pure delight. The property, location, facilities, tranquility was just wonderful. We had the garden room and it was just perfect. Roomy, delightful decor, with delightful outdoor for relaxing, eating and just beeing !
The other areas to enjoy indoor relaxing was also extensive.
We just loved everything about it, including Margaret and Gary.
